name: Invasion of Barbarians
description: Once upon a time… My lord, our lands are attacked! Having been got out of naked women, accompanied with heart-rending servant’s shout, you harried up to an urgent audience with the King. Congratulations! Now you are in the head of the castle, country and motherland defense.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or better Processor: Dual Core 2.4 Ghz or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce 9600 GS, Radeon HD4000 or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space
